alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe and central Broward Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Loop Road Ee Center, or 20 miles east of Chokoloskee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Loop Road Ee Center, Big Cypress National Preserve, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Miccosukee Service Plaza and Everglades National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
